Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Bank of America pledged $1 billion directly to Black Lives Matter, when in fact the bank pledged $1 billion to communities of color and minority-owned businesses affected by COVID-19.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Bank of America did not pledge any money directly to the Black Lives Matter organization.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading post on social media.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the funds pledged by Bank of America are "war money" for the Black Lives Matter movement, which is not supported by any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, as it may have stemmed from a mistaken report by Lou Dobbs on Fox Business, which was later corrected and apologized for.
